text: Welcome Tripper. Beyond here lies your destiny. Tell me, are you a kind and nurturing soul who wants to see those around them grow?
Interesting. If it benefits you, would you use a resource until it is depleted? Even if depleting that resource may hurt others later on?
I see. Do you prefer the open road to the mountain trail?
Does the willfulness of others cause you discomfort or irritation?
Do you think that sometimes the best way to solve a problem is raze everything to the ground and start again?
Are you eagre to embrace new challenges and experiences? How much do you like being at the front of the pack?
How much of your life have you spent fumbling in a greasy till?
Hmm...we're getting closer. Answer me this - how much comfort do you find in tangible and familiar things?
Do humour and whimsey speak to your soul Tripper? How much joy does a little silliness bring?
I think I have the measure of you now Tripper. Last question: are you willing to take a chance, but potentially lose it all?
